testsHelp.name: xep0045
testsHelp.instructions: Configurable in the admin console, on the pages Group Chat.

testsHelp.name: xep0160
testsHelp.instructions: Configurable in the admin console, on the page Server > Server Settings > Offline Messages.

testsHelp.name: xep0077
testsHelp.instructions: Configurable in the admin console, on the page Server > Server Settings > Registration & Login.

testsHelp.name: xep0157
testsHelp.instructions: The non-empty email address for any admin user is exposed as an 'admin' contact.

testsHelp.name: roster_versioning
testsHelp.instructions: Can be enabled/disabled by setting a boolean value in a property named 'xmpp.client.roster.versioning.active'.

testsHelp.name: xep0198
testsHelp.instructions: Can be enabled/disabled by setting a boolean value in a property named 'stream.management.active'.

testsHelp.name: xep0065
testsHelp.instructions: Configurable in the admin console, on the page Server > Server Settings > File Transfer Settings.

testsHelp.name: xep0313
testsHelp.instructions: Although MAM is provided by earlier versions of the plugin, proper advertisement of the feature (required for this check to be successful) was added in version 1.7.0.
